attributes.action: Give Parish and Town Councils the say over planning, and not let it be over-rulled by District and County Councils.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Parish and Town coucnillors are elected to serve their communities, and one of the biggest issues is planning.

With some parish councils opposing development of areas, only for the distict council to rail road plans through anyway.

Distric councillors are often out of touch of the needs of a town or village, and should not be allowed to overrule any decisions made by the local councillors.
